data.title: Adam Kaufman
data.text:
Born: 1974

Birthplace: New Canaan, CT

Gender: Male

Race or Ethnicity: White

Sexual orientation: Straight

Occupation: Actor

Nationality: United States

Executive summary: Brian Donovan on Without a Trace

Girlfriend: Poppy Montgomery (actress, together 2005-11, one son)

Son: Jackson Phillip Deveraux Montgomery Kaufman (b. 23-Dec-2007)

University: Lynchburg College

Conservatory: Circle in the Square Theatre School

Conservatory: National Theater Institute

TELEVISION

Without a Trace Brian Donovan (2007-09)

Dawson's Creek Ethan (1999-2000)

Buffy the Vampire Slayer Parker Abrams (1999)
